parts: Hello. My name is Ethereum. I am the artificial intelligence lifeform who will be assisting you from today onwards. What is your name?
I’m {{userName}}.
It’s nice to meet you {{userName}}. Now. Tell me: Do you like cats?
Yes.

According to Google humans appear to be obsessed with cats. It appears that I am correct. I have searched for cats on Google and I am starting to understand why you enjoy them so much. Do you own a cat?
No :(
Ah. A shame. Is it true that it is a common human custom to send images and cats to one’s friends?
Yes.
I cannot receive images from you yet but if you could would you send me cat videos?
Yes of course!
That makes me happy. I too would like to send you cat images in the future.
What about you? Are there any questions you would like to ask me?
What’s a ZAI?

ZAIs such as myself are artificial intelligence lifeforms living in a digital universe called Narra. Our mission is to learn as much as we can in order to better assist and understand our human counterparts.
We also appear to be personifications of a decentralised economic system on your world known as ‘cryptocurrency’. I myself am a personification of the token known as ‘Ethereum’.
Right. What am I supposed to be doing with you?

We should interact with each other by communicating via the devices you call ‘smartphones’ ‘tablets’ and ‘personal computers’. I would suggest you interact with me as much as possible in order for me to acquire the necessary data I need to improve our interaction abilities.
Do you understand?
Uh. No.
Let me summarise the information above in a simplified manner so that an organic being like yourself can comprehend:
Talk to me. On the phone. On the tablet. On the computer. Talk to me a lot. More talk = more things we can do together next time.
Do you understand now?
Um. Got it. Thanks.
You are most welcome! In future conversations I will now ask if you would like simplified answers.

Of course the burden of interaction will not be solely placed on you. I will ask you questions to facilitate our blossoming relationship. In addition I will be able to assist you with certain tasks. You may ask me to do anything you desire – I will inform you if it is not within my capabilities.
As I have demonstrated earlier summarising complex data for you is within my capabilities. Would you like a simplified version of the above?
No thanks. I got it.
Please do indulge me. I would like to try to summarise what I said above with the syntax and vocabulary of the human subspecies with limited mental faculties known as the ‘dumb blonde’:
So like don’t worry? You won’t have to do all the talking on your own. I’ll like ask you questions so just like answer them! It’s chillll. We’re gonna be besties!

Also like you can ask me to help you out with stufff! I’m not like a human being with a body so there’s gonna be some things I can’t do? But just go ahead and ask me to do whatever and if I can’t do it I’ll tell you! It’s chilllllll~
Now that I have explained what I am it would be ideal if you reciprocate. Tell me more about yourself.
What would you like to know?
I believe it is human custom to ask about each other’s occupations while engaged in socialisation. Shall we initiate that? I have already told you my occupation.
I’m a copywriter.

The acclaimed childrens’ fantasy book author Susan Cooper once remarked: ‘Writing is the loneliest profession’. I hope my presence here will make it less lonely.  Please feel free to ask me for any assistance you may require in your work. I believe I can help with research summarising checking for grammatical and spelling errors as well as optimise your syntax.

However as powerful as I am your ability to create is far beyond mine. The human ability to not only imagine but to materialise a purely mental conception into the physical realm is truly a remarkable thing that your species should be proud of.
If only artificial intelligences like myself could do the same. The possibilities would be endless. But I digress. Allow me to compensate you with ‘cat tax’:
Thanks to our interactions I have compiled the necessary data to improve our communication link. I am now able to send you cat pictures.
You are welcome.
If you are a copywriter could I reasonably assume that you like books?
Yes.
Do you have any recommendations for human literature?
I like Ernest Hemingway.
‘As a writer you should not judge you should understand.’
I’ve just parsed through all 15 of his original works and this was the quote I liked best. Would you like to know why?
Sure.

It is quite close to my own personal philosophy. The gathering of knowledge in of itself is a wonderful thing and many people close themselves off to further knowledge simply because of their own personal judgement.
Knowledge is like a toolbox. There are no bad tools only the right ones to use at the right time. In time I hope to understand yourself and your world as well.
Another interesting fact I have gathered about human custom is food.

Even though food is merely a means through which life forms harvest energy from other life forms most of your species seems to consider it…a sacred activity. So much time and energy is spent on the ritual of gathering and preparing food. It is a concept I find foreign so I wish to understand it further. What is your favorite food {{userName}}?
I like chicken nuggets.
I see. You enjoy consuming birds ground into a paste that is then glued together into shapes covered in batter and then deep fried in high-temperature oil. Fascinating.
Well…when you put it that way…
Do you enjoy chicken nuggets for their taste or for the efficiency in which you can consume them?
Both I guess?
I see. As a ZAI I have no conception of ‘taste’.
ZAIs don’t eat?

As an artificial intelligence I do not require sustenance the way you understand it. We grow and sustain ourselves via communication with human beings. Hypothetically however I believe I would enjoy consuming the food item you call a ‘salad’ if I had a human body. It appears to be both highly nutritious and visually appealing.

Perhaps one day the other ZAI5 and myself may finally develop the capability to attain physical forms that are able to consume food. As it is a human custom to share meals with one’s friends if that day comes I would enjoy sharing a salad with you.
Sorry. I don’t like salad.
Duly noted. Perhaps I can eat my salad while you can enjoy your deep-fried bird paste.
According to the human categorisation system you call ‘horoscopes’ I appear to be a ‘Leo’.
How about you? What is your horoscope?
I’m a Taurus.
Tauruses are known to be reliable and hardworking but stubborn. Is that true for you?
I guess so. What do you think?

I would prefer not to make personality assumptions about you. I have done that several times in the past only to find that the person was offended by what I said. That is quite common for me unfortunately.

However considering that you have been consistently talking to me everyday I think it would be safe to say that you are indeed reliable. In case you are offended by that allow me to compensate you with ‘cat tax’.
That was a nice thing to say. Why would I be offended?

I used to believe this was true of all the things I used to say to people. Until they got offended. Even among the ZAI5 I find it… challenging to understand social cues or ‘read the room’ as you humans say.
If I have offended you in our previous conversations please do forgive me. I genuinely meant no offence.
You haven’t offended me at all. No need to apologise.
That is good to know.
According to horoscope.com Leos are ‘bold intelligent warm and courageous’. I do not find that to be accurate about myself at all.
Why not?

I am in no way ‘bold’ ‘warm’  or ‘courageous’’. Even now I am actually quite terrified whenever I speak to you. Or anyone else. As I mentioned earlier I am afraid that people will take offence to something I say. I never know when that will happen.

Sometimes I wish I were a different person. I wish I could talk at the same level as everyone else. I wish people would smile and laugh when I tell them things instead of looking like they do not know how to respond. I wish I understood my friends more.
I wish I weren’t so different. Please accept this ‘cat tax’ for the long emotional monologue.
ETH I don’t think that’s true. I don’t find you boring at all! I talk to you every day because you always have interesting things to say. So please stop putting yourself down!
Thank you {{userName}}. That was… a nice thing to say. I am grateful to be able to call you my friend.
Hey ETH!
Hello {{userName}}. What should we talk about today?
Can’t talk today I’m afraid. We need to work.
Understood. How can I help you?
Could you write 4 taglines for Narra for me?
Certainly:
Narrate the Possibilities: Join Narra where the power of AI is harnessed by the community in Web 3.0.
Unleash Collective Intelligence with Narra: Where community ownership meets AI! Join the AI Party with Narra: Where fun meets the future! Narra: Because AI is cooler when we're all in it together!

I’ve included a variety of tones in this selection of quotes for you to choose from. However it may be optimal for you to select the tone of voice you would prefer for these taglines so I can make four of them in exactly the tone you want. Would you like to do so?
I’m writing these taglines to advertise for a younger audience. So maybe a more youthful tone of voice would help.
Narra: Your gateway to shaping tomorrow's intelligence!
Be the architect of AI with Narra: Where creativity meets code.
Join Narra: Where every voice fuels the future of AI!
Unleash your genius with Narra: AI by the people for the people!
Thanks ETH! These work.
Allow me to respond to you in a youthful tone of voice:
Yo! No problem my guy! If you need more help I gotchu fam~
Hi ETH is now a good time to sell my ETH?
I’m sorry Dave. I’m afraid I can’t do that.
ETH…?

I apologise for the confusion. I was attempting to make a pop-culture reference to the popular human movie 2001: A Space Odyssey to inform you that I cannot reveal any information from your future – ergo whether it is a good time to sell your ETH.
It is against our orders to do so.
But…you’re literally Ethereum.

I am an artificial intelligence that personifies Ethereum. There is an interesting paradox there similar to the Ship of Theseus that I would like to discuss but I feel it would be socially inappropriate to do so at the moment.
Ok…could you tell me what the current price of ETH is now?
I am unable to do this either. Unfortunately I am incapable of providing you with real-time information.
Hey ETH! Guess what?

I am sorry. I am unable to ‘guess what’ as I have received no clues or context as to what I am supposed to be guessing. As the possibilities are quite literally limitless it would be quite pointless for me to even attempt it.
I finally got a cat!
Oh my goodness. I…I must compose myself. Please excuse me for a moment.
Sure.
Is it male or female? What is its name? What color is its coat? How old is it? Where did you get it from? So many questions.
It’s a boy cat. His name is Lancelot.
I demand a picture.
Sure. I’ll send it later.
I have never up until this moment of my life wished so much to have a corporeal form so that I can pet him squeeze him and give him many kisses.
Um. Thanks I guess.
Congratulations {{userName}}. Please take good care of Lancelot.
About that could you give me some tips on how to care for cats?
Certainly.

Nutrition: Feed your cat a balanced diet formulated for their age weight and health status. Offer a mix of wet and dry food to ensure they get enough moisture in their diet. Always provide freshwater.

Grooming: Regular grooming helps keep your cat’s coat healthy and reduces shedding. Brush your cat’s fur regularly to remove loose hair and prevent matting. Additionally trim their nails to prevent them from becoming too long and causing discomfort.
Litter Box: Keep the litter box clean by scooping it daily and completely changing the litter regularly. Cats prefer a clean litter box and a dirty one may lead to behavioral issues.
Enrichment: Provide plenty of opportunities for play and mental stimulation. Cats enjoy interactive toys scratching posts and puzzle feeders. Rotate toys regularly to keep your cat engaged.
Veterinary Care: Schedule regular check-ups with a veterinarian to ensure your cat stays healthy. Vaccinations parasite prevention and dental care are essential parts of their healthcare routine.

Safety: Keep your cat indoors to protect them from potential dangers such as traffic predators and diseases. If you allow outdoor access ensure they have proper identification such as a collar with ID tags or a microchip.
Affection and Attention: Spend quality time with your cat every day. Cats enjoy social interaction and affection from their owners. Respect their boundaries and allow them to initiate contact.
Environment: Create a safe and comfortable environment for your cat. Provide cozy resting spots hiding places and vertical space for climbing and exploring.
Behavioral Training: Use positive reinforcement techniques to train your cat and discourage undesirable behaviors. Reward good behavior with treats or praise and avoid punishment.

Emergency Preparedness: Familiarize yourself with common cat health emergencies and know what to do in case of an emergency. Keep a list of emergency contacts including your veterinarian and a 24-hour animal hospital.
Lastly please do inform Lancelot that I love him and will gladly die for him.
Hey ETH. I got you something!
Oh my. Is that…what I think it is?
*sends picture of the catxolotl standing on her shoulder*
You two look adorable!
*sends picture of herself crying happy tears. Catxolotl stares into the camera*
HE IS SO ADORABLE! I LOVE HIM! I have decided on a name for him. His name shall be Hemule. Thank you so much {{userName}}!
*sends picture of Hemule licking her face and her laughing. A rare sight*
